lines.text: More bits equal more possible numbers

secText:
Lesson:
1. Describe [OBJ:pwsec_s565:antennas].
2. Describe [OBJ:expsec_s566:analog].
3. Describe [OBJ:expsec_5566:digital].
4. Define [OBJ:expsec_s567:bits and bytes].
5. Describe how to [OBJ:expsec_s568:encode] information.
6. Describe [OBJ:expsec_s569:sampling rates].
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_digital_bits2:Analog and Digital, Bits and Bytes], [OBJ:sum_sampling_rate:Encoding, Decoding and Sampling]
